import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { FormControl, Avatar, TextField } from "@material-ui/core"; import { Divider, FieldTitle, PrimaryButton } from "../../../atoms"; import Icons from "../../../../resources/icons"; import { useSimpleForm, useApiRequest } from "../../../../hooks"; import "./index.scss"; const formShape = { name: "", lastname: "", phone: "", email: "", phonePrefix: "", city: "", zipCode: "", birthdate: "", password: "", passwordConfirm: "", }; export const Form = ({ user, toggleEditForm, isServiceProvider }) => { const { values, onChange } = useSimpleForm({ ...formShape, ...user }); const { patchRequest } = useApiRequest(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (values.password || values.passwordConfirm) { alert("No se pueden actualizar contraseñas todavía"); return; } if (values.password && values.password !== values.passwordConfirm) { alert("las contaseñas no coinciden"); return; } patchRequest(`user/${user.id}`, values) .then((response) => { console.log("recived response is: ", response); }) .catch((err) => { console.log("there was an error", err); }); }; return (
Enviar
Cancelar
); }; Form.defaultProps = { user: PropTypes.object, toggleEditForm: PropTypes.func, isServiceProvider: PropTypes.bool, };
